Title: Relates to the installation of solar canopies in certain parking facilities
Summary: Permits and encourages state owned parking facilities to install solar canopies in any parking garage, open parking lot or other parking facility owned and/or operated by the state of New York, that offers parking spaces for the purposes of public use, state employee use or pay-per-usage constructed prior to January 1, 2030; requires such installation after January 1, 2030.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to installing solar canopies in certain parking facilitates
